EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Emai Hon Ops Forum Paris.201803_EMEAI_PARIS ops conf Invite_Irina
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to join the Honeywell Operators Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS FORUM-Paris Edition Dear Customers and Partners,
On behalf of Honeywell Aerospace and our sponsors, I am pleased to invite you to the 2018 Honeywell Operators Forum. Our general sessions and partner sessions are filled with keynotes and demos that showcase our latest technologies, as well as the mandate updates that you don't want to miss. Please see the event details below.
Date: June 18,2018 Location: Hotel: AC Hotel Paris Le Bourget Airport, 2 Rue de la Haye, 93440 Dugny Le Bourget
Agenda:
09:30- 10:00
Registration
10:00 -11:00
Honeywell Customer & Product Support updates
MyAerospace portal orders, Technical Publications, Claims
Products road maps, Repair capability locator
Useful Contacts & Q&A
11:30 - 12:00
Honeywell Protection plans for avionics and engines
12:00 -13:00
Open discussion & Lunch
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018EmaiHonOpsForumParis_201805.html]]>
We look forward to meeting you in Paris!
Anna Tomova Customer Support Manager
